languages.text: {n}Вас обволакивает запах старой ржавчины. Тьма расступается неохотно: сначала приходит боль — пульсирующая, в голове, затем металлический привкус во рту и, наконец, ощущение жесткого пола, раздражающее саднящую щеку.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: РТ просыпается в клетке с пентаграммой.

traits.locale_text: {n}Вас обволакивает запах старой ржавчины. Тьма расступается неохотно: сначала приходит боль — пульсирующая, в голове, затем металлический привкус во рту и, наконец, ощущение жесткого пола, раздражающее саднящую щеку.{/n}

languages.translation_comment: РТ просыпается в клетке с пентаграммой.

languages.text: {n}You are surrounded by the smell of old rust. The darkness reluctantly retreats: the pain comes first — throbbing in your head; then the metallic taste in your mouth; and finally the feel of the hard floor, chafing your stinging cheek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вас обволакивает запах старой ржавчины. Тьма расступается неохотно: сначала приходит боль — пульсирующая, в голове, затем металлический привкус во рту и, наконец, ощущение жесткого пола, раздражающее саднящую щеку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You are surrounded by the smell of old rust. The darkness reluctantly retreats: the pain comes first — throbbing in your head; then the metallic taste in your mouth; and finally the feel of the hard floor, chafing your stinging cheek.{/n}

{n}You are surrounded by the smell of old rust. The darkness reluctantly retreats: the pain comes first — throbbing in your head; then the metallic taste in your mouth; and finally the feel of the hard floor, chafing your stinging cheek.{/n}

{n}You are surrounded by the smell of old rust. The darkness reluctantly retreats: the pain comes first — throbbing in your head; then the metallic taste in your mouth; and finally the feel of the hard floor, chafing your stinging cheek.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你感觉身边充满了陈年铁锈的味道。黑暗不情愿地慢慢退散，最先恢复的感觉是痛觉，仿佛刺穿了你的脑袋。随后，你嘴里传来了金属的味道。最后，你感觉到了地面坚硬的触感，摩擦着你刺痛的脸颊。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are surrounded by the smell of old rust. The darkness reluctantly retreats: the pain comes first — throbbing in your head; then the metallic taste in your mouth; and finally the feel of the hard floor, chafing your stinging cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你感觉身边充满了陈年铁锈的味道。黑暗不情愿地慢慢退散，最先恢复的感觉是痛觉，仿佛刺穿了你的脑袋。随后，你嘴里传来了金属的味道。最后，你感觉到了地面坚硬的触感，摩擦着你刺痛的脸颊。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un olor a herrumbre te rodea por todas partes. La oscuridad se disipa gradualmente: primero notas el dolor, como punzadas en la cabeza; después un regusto metálico en la boca; y finalmente el frío y duro suelo contra tu dolorida mejilla.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are surrounded by the smell of old rust. The darkness reluctantly retreats: the pain comes first — throbbing in your head; then the metallic taste in your mouth; and finally the feel of the hard floor, chafing your stinging cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un olor a herrumbre te rodea por todas partes. La oscuridad se disipa gradualmente: primero notas el dolor, como punzadas en la cabeza; después un regusto metálico en la boca; y finalmente el frío y duro suelo contra tu dolorida mejilla.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Etrafın pas kokusuyla çevrili. Karanlık, isteksizce geri çekiliyor. Önce başını zonklatan acı hissi geliyor, sonra ağzındaki metalik tat... Son olarak da sert zeminin hissiyatı, sızlayan yanağını tahriş ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are surrounded by the smell of old rust. The darkness reluctantly retreats: the pain comes first — throbbing in your head; then the metallic taste in your mouth; and finally the feel of the hard floor, chafing your stinging cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Etrafın pas kokusuyla çevrili. Karanlık, isteksizce geri çekiliyor. Önce başını zonklatan acı hissi geliyor, sonra ağzındaki metalik tat... Son olarak da sert zeminin hissiyatı, sızlayan yanağını tahriş ediyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}古い錆のにおいに囲まれている。暗闇が徐々に引いていく。まず痛みがくる―頭がズキズキし、それから口の中に鉄の味がして、最後に固い床の感覚があり、ヒリヒリする頬を擦りむく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are surrounded by the smell of old rust. The darkness reluctantly retreats: the pain comes first — throbbing in your head; then the metallic taste in your mouth; and finally the feel of the hard floor, chafing your stinging cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}古い錆のにおいに囲まれている。暗闇が徐々に引いていく。まず痛みがくる―頭がズキズキし、それから口の中に鉄の味がして、最後に固い床の感覚があり、ヒリヒリする頬を擦りむく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une odeur de vieille rouille domine. L'obscurité se retire comme à contrecœur. D'abord vient la douleur, des élancements lancinants dans la tête, puis un goût métallique dans la bouche, et enfin, la sensation du sol dur sur votre joue.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are surrounded by the smell of old rust. The darkness reluctantly retreats: the pain comes first — throbbing in your head; then the metallic taste in your mouth; and finally the feel of the hard floor, chafing your stinging cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une odeur de vieille rouille domine. L'obscurité se retire comme à contrecœur. D'abord vient la douleur, des élancements lancinants dans la tête, puis un goût métallique dans la bouche, et enfin, la sensation du sol dur sur votre joue.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bist umgeben vom Geruch von altem Rost. Die Dunkelheit zieht sich nur zögerlich zurück. Die Schmerzen kommen zuerst, ein Pochen in deinem Kopf. Dann der metallische Geschmack in deinem Mund. Und schließlich das Gefühl des harten Bodens, der an deiner brennenden Wange reibt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are surrounded by the smell of old rust. The darkness reluctantly retreats: the pain comes first — throbbing in your head; then the metallic taste in your mouth; and finally the feel of the hard floor, chafing your stinging cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bist umgeben vom Geruch von altem Rost. Die Dunkelheit zieht sich nur zögerlich zurück. Die Schmerzen kommen zuerst, ein Pochen in deinem Kopf. Dann der metallische Geschmack in deinem Mund. Und schließlich das Gefühl des harten Bodens, der an deiner brennenden Wange reibt.{/n}
